Constructor Detail

MoveManager

public MoveManager()
The MoveManager constructor calls init() and update() to connect to all active controllers

MoveManager

public MoveManager(int mode)
The MoveManager constructor calls init() and update() to connect to all active controllers This overloaded constructor offers the possiblity to customize the type of messages printed by the library. For now, only VERBOSE and SILENT (default) are available.

Parameters:
mode - Pass 1 to display debug messages
Method Detail

update

public void update()
Poll active controllers for new values and update the LED and vibration

Deactivate all controllers (doesn't disconnects them from the computer)

Activate sensor fusion for all controllers

                    int g,

Parameters:
r - Red value [0-255]
g - Green value [0-255]
b - Blue value [0-255]

Parameters:
rumble - is the value of the vibration [0-255]
